flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
Believed to have been used since 5000 BC in the Sumerian society, our most ancient findings belong to the instrument, the remaining years, 2800-3000 BC, now exhibited in the Museum of America, Philadelphia University reed flute. In that period the instrument is thought to have been used in religious ceremonies. Thibaut'un Assomption priest "mysterious, enticing, sweet and harmonious sound," he defined this way and poetry sadâsı, deeply affect people at all times, especially the religious feelings are associated: "Cane is passing over, the birds awaken the fears of a fresh breeze wing writhing" .

This feature is coming what, has become an important instrument in relations in every society. Ney started to use it in conjunction with the Turks to Islam, XIII. century onwards, has become a symbol of Islamic mysticism. This, we lived in this century, great mystic, philosopher, poet, and parents Hz. Mevlana Celaleddin-iRumi's role in this.

XV. century, a traveler who has lived in their own particular travelogue Gıyaseddin Nakkaş'ın develop their use in writing a note, we know it is very interesting to see the court of the khanate Hitay Turks:

"Khanate in Sadinfu up to three hundred thousand men and women had gathered in front of the palace. Instrumentation and organize the same sound as the musician been two thousand (and tuning), hakana prayed in unison. Two sides of drums fiddle, the ney, and other reeds music singers were seated. Some of Ney Players play and what it might be expected, some of the holes in the middle of blowing. "

What do they go too far music known Hitay Turks, Central Asia since the use of the past, and even understood that it is just blowing like a flute.

The date of the Turkic-i Nay, Nay nice (or run Ney), today referred to with names such as kurre Nay nay not know exactly what the name of the structure and properties derived from the many instruments are available. However, the current form of this instrument is used as a place, assume that very different.

MevlanaKapisi.Net

guide.title: The History Of Reed Flute
